I have such a love/hate relationship with this game, but unlike other online games I've played that have become stagnant, I admit that I do still have a lot of fun with DBD. There is a lot that goes wrong sometimes but the gameplay is still very fun and there are many interesting characters/lore. I'm pretty hooked on the game (no pun intended). There is still too much toxicity in the game to the point where I feel it actually changes people and while I do encourage that people should be a lot less toxic because it is just a game at the end of the day, I don't let toxicity bother me anymore. It's the equivalent of flies buzzing around a pile of crap. It just happens but can easily be ignored. But the big reason why I still discourage toxicity anyway? Because I do get concerned for people that actually change because of it. Don't ever compromise who you are as a person over something subjective like a game. Apart from that, I still really enjoy DBD and think it's a great game to play with friends, play killer for a challenge, or just YOLO it in solo queue.

My opinion still hasn't changed over the last few months about this game. But. The last update was basically a huge FU to the entire killer player base or... well... everyone. The hex:ruin changes makes the trails last 10 times less and for killers that don't have enough map pressure, well, expect a 5 minute game at higher ranks after the update goes live. 
And the matchmaking. Jesus Christ the matchmaking. What's up with being a rank 10 killer and getting purple rank survivors that are basically a breath away from red ranks. 
As far as I'm concerned, wait 'till the devs fix all of this and then buy it. But for now? Save your money

추천합니다.

3개월마다 새로운 컨텐츠가 나와서 필수적인 퍽들을 익혀야하는 뉴비들에게는 진입 장벽이 조금 있을지도 모르지만, 적응만 된다면 플탐 몇 천 시간이고 찍을 수 있는 아주 재미있는 게임입니다. 
요즘은 잘 안 하지만 한때 2주 플탐 100시간도 찍었었죠.
옛날처럼 잡다한 버그들이 있는 것도 아니고 비매너 플레이어들이나 핵 유저들을 신고할 수 있는 창구도 마련되어 있고 답변도 꽤나 빨리 주는 편입니다. 유명한 게임, 영화, 드라마 등과도 콜라보하면서 벌써 데바데가 5주년을 맞았네요.
2018년도부터 했던 유저로서 데바데가 앞으로도 흥하길~

Its fun, teamwork on one side and personal single player accomplishment on the other. Its also note worthy that this company does not act like a Communist piece of shit trying to control your every thought and action, there is no voice or chat unless you play as a team with friends. Its a fun multi-player experince or a great team play game, or both, whatever you like this game is very enjoyable and the perks, customazation etc. keeps you grinding for bloodpoints to upgrade your charaters and keeps it intresting for many, many hours. A great game, worth the money for sure and lots of heart pumping fun.

Locked to 62fps without changing ini files. Only allows you to select low medium high or ultra graphical settings-wise, with no fine control. For a first time player, it will instantly pop up a lot of event messages to tell you about stuff you still have no clue about.

I haven't even gotten to play the game for real yet, but all of this was such an instant turnoff i refunded it. I've got 620 other games I can play, so I really don't need another game I need to edit inis in to get it working even slightly correctly, or another really confusing one.

There is way too much to say about the game I've played for almost 3k hrs by the time of this review. Too keep long story short - it's a decent game, which I love playing. However, one should keep in mind that:

- entrance barrier is very high. It's not so much about skill ceiling - this game is easy to learn, but extremely hard to master. The main issue is related to grinding and gaining knowledge about all the perks, all the killers, how you can play as and against them. DBD keeps growing with new chapters being released every 3 months. Thus, it was much, I repeat, MUCH easier to start playing this game back in 2016 than now.

- balance issues. DBD is an asymmetrical pvp game, meaning that each side is capable of bringing something extremely annoying to the table, leading to a great deal of frustration and confusion of their opponents. Same goes true for the map design - you can never be 100% sure whether you are going to get favorable conditions or not. Thus, your game results are not always dependent solely on players' skill. Inconsistent results while playing against the very same group of people is a real thing.

With that in mind, you are likely to enjoy this game. Just please, for the love of Christ, don't treat it like a competitive esport game, have fun and learn from your mistakes. gl hf!

üstte sıraladığım (-) yanlardan örnekler
oyunda üst üste win alınca karşınıza çok net bir şekilde hile geliyor bunu bir çok kişi legit kullanıyor ama oyunu çok iyi öğrendiğinizde hilecinin yaptığı hataları fark edebiliyorsunuz onun dışında duvardan felan geçiren uçan kaçan da var, her iki tarafta da aynı şekilde durum,

rank sistemi bir işe yaramıyor oyunda rank dışı farklı bir sistem ile eşleşiyorsunuz ve bu berbat bir halde,

oyundaki bir çok kritik avantaj bug'lardan dolayı çalışmayacak  herhangi bir eylemde oyun sizi geri atacak katilin uzanamayacağı yerlerden darbe alacaksınız,

daha güzel grafikler sunan oyunlarda bile daha fazla fps alırken bu oyunda alamayacaksınız 

maça girip takımın sizi satması katil ile anlaşıp sizi öldürtmesi gibi bir çok toxic kişi var oyunda ve bunlar banlanmıyor

oyunda çok güçlü bazı katilleri satın almanız için pamuk elleri cebe atmanız gerek 

oyun camp atmaya çok açık hatta ha oyundaki bir çok avantaj camp atmak için ve bazı katiller de camp atmak için, oyun başı bir bubba sizi yakalayıp siz ölene kadar kancadan ayrılmayabilir

游戏紧张刺激，有多种恐怖元素风格，扮演逃生者被追杀时的求生欲，扮演杀手时对猎物的渴望；美中不足是萌新玩屠夫匹配时间非常慢，甚至排一个小时才有人，游戏经常出问题，比如游戏结束后，显示段位更新失败，又或者游戏错误，直接返回重新加载，还有进房间匹配的时候突然就闪退，之前匹配的时间又要重新匹配等等问题，希望好好优化一下游戏的稳定性，对这个游戏充满期待。
最引人入胜的地方就是它的博弈性 同时逃生者间不能互相交流的机制也非常吸引人 全靠逃生者的默契和意识 很喜欢这类游戏。
